dcterms:creator: Samuel R. Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D. Manning
dcterms:description: A large annotated corpus for learning natural language inference, containing approximately 570,000 sentence pairs where premise sentences were obtained by crawling image descriptions and hypothesis sentences were manually generated and annotated.
dcterms:title: Stanford NLI (SNLI)

dcterms:creator: Adina Williams
Nikita Nangia
Samuel Bowman
dcterms:description: A broad-coverage challenge corpus for sentence understanding through inference, containing approximately 430,000 sentence pairs from both written and spoken speech in a wide range of styles.
dcterms:title: Multi-Genre NLI (MNLI)

dcterms:creator: Marco Marelli
Stefano Menini
Marco Baroni
Luisa Bentivogli
Raffaella Bernardi
Roberto Zamparelli
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for the evaluation of compositional distributional semantic models, containing approximately 10,000 sentence pairs.
dcterms:title: SICK
